title: The Red Door
description: The Red Door (Erotica M/F/M and M/M/F with M/M) Returning home four years after tragedy struck, Aurora Hammond finds herself in an exclusive BDSM club called The Red Door. Club owner, Mitch Reed, and Dom, Alex James, want Aurora to be theirs, even if they have to share. When a sex-trafficking ring is revealed to be using the club and targeting Aurora, truths and feelings are brought to light. Can Mitch and Alex protect her, or will their desires for each other be used against them and put Aurora in jeopardy? The Red Door is book one in The Door Trilogy.
author: J.L. Massey
